metadata.title: CVE-2021-41585 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Improper Input Validation vulnerability in accepting socket connections inApache Traffic Server allows an attacker to make the server stop acceptingnew connections. This issue affects Apache Traffic Server 5.0.0 to 9.1.0.

criterions.comment: trafficserver: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
